Name: Novice Gauntlets
Description: If you own these items, you can go to the wardrobe to mix and match, becoming the most dazzling adventurer!
Description$english: If you own these items, you can go to the wardrobe to mix and match, becoming the most dazzling adventurer!
Description2$english: Asterleeds is a city of fashion, where designers create beautiful designs in clothing, accessories, and jewelry of various styles. People are passionate about collecting these fashion items and matching them according to their preferences.
